California Cuts Zero Emission Vehicles 70-79% Like it? 0 Posted March 30, 2008 Late last week, the California Air Resources Board (CARB) held the Zero Emission Vehicle (ZEV) board meeting previewed in Killing the Electric Car Again Part 1 and Part 2 . CARB appears to have put on a partially choreographed show. Agency staff played the role of “ bad cop .” Before the meeting they proposed cutting ZEVs by 90%, setting the scene for the Board appointees to play “ good cop ” and change the cuts to 70%.
